sql-script.tran-sql: create table sf_msg_p2p ( id char(32) not null, messagemark int not null, createdate timestamp not null, fromid char(32), category int not null, topic varchar(128) not null, content clob not null, tousers varchar(128), userid char(32), readdate timestamp, messagestatus smallint not null, primary key(id) );

create table sf_msg_p2plog ( id char(32) not null, messagemark int not null, createdate timestamp not null, fromId char(32), category int not null, topic varchar(128) not null, content clob not null, tousers varchar(128), userid char(32), messagesendto smallint not null, primary key(id) );

create table sf_msg_subscribe ( id char(32) not null, messagemark int not null, createdate timestamp not null, category int not null, fromId char(32), topic varchar(128) not null, content clob not null, primary key(id) );
create table sf_msg_subscribe_read ( id char(32) not null, messageId char(32) not null, userid char(32) not null, readdate timestamp, deletedate timestamp, primary key(id) );
